message:
U may miss something :) !

Not gamers only should use their GPU !! ... 3:)
Try to Turn ur switchable graphics ON on laptop .. and watch 3D's again !!
I own my probook 2years now ! .. What a stupidity to missing all that beauty O:) .. all that time :O :D !

data.message:
Just an advice, proper English will help you be taken seriously. This includes, among others, proper capitalization, no excess amount of smilies, correct punctuation and no 'ur'.

I say this because I wrote like this too when I was 14 and only when someone brought it to my attention, I realized how stupid I looked.

I thought it would be some kinda cool to speak like that ! 
But I will consider speaking formally next time In Sha' Allah ... I am very thankful for your advice .. of course I need my speech to be taken seriously !
